Welcome to Your Justia Insights Newsletter

Stay informed with the newsletter designed to bring updates and insights from our team directly to the Justia Connect community.

Featured Webinar

Understanding Loan Transactions for the Non-Finance Attorney

This presentation aims to demystify loan transactions for attorneys who find themselves providing counsel to borrowers. It does so by giving purposeful explanations of the various documents contained in a loan document package, and by giving practical advice for reviewing those documents and providing quality representation for their clients.

Justia CLE & Webinars: Free Law: Resources, Technology & Legal Issues (Past, Present & Future)

Legal research has always been a core part of your career as a lawyer, but who says you have to break the bank for it? In this Justia Webinar, join Tim Stanley as he not only covers the history of free law and its impact in the present day, but also showcases the best places to find legal research online for free.

The Addicted Lawyer: A CLE Webinar on Substance Abuse & Mental Health in the Legal Profession

In the fast-paced, high-pressure world of law, mental health and substance abuse struggles are often hidden behind a facade of success. In this Justia Webinar, join Brian Cuban as we look behind the facade and explore the real substance abuse and mental health challenges faced by legal professionals.
